arts.ttl: Calum Kavanagh and George Lapslie fire Bradford to emphatic win over Colchester
Colchester United under-21s concede late to lose to Ipswich Town
arts.sum: Then the U's so nearly took the lead after Ronnie Harvey made a tremendous run down the right, unselfishly fed left to Ollie Godziemski who was denied by very good save by Ipswich goalkeeper, Charlie Binns. Godziemski’s shot on the turn was diverted into the side netting by Binns while Hakeem Sandah saw his effort blocked and when Godziemski netted the rebound he was judged offside.

arts.ttl: Bradford v Colchester United: predicted line-ups, odds, all you need to know
arts.sum: Colchester United head coach Danny Cowley on Bradford City: Colchester United defender Fiacre Kelleher returns to his former club Bradford this afternoon, where he made 11 appearances between 2021 and 2023.

arts.ttl: 'I’m proud of the fact that I’ve done that': Arthur Read on Colchester milestone
arts.sum: “It’s nice and to play more than 100 games for one club, I don’t think many people get the chance to do that. Colchester head to second-placed Bradford City tomorrow lying in seventh spot in the table and in the play-off positions, with nine games remaining.

arts.ttl: On-loan Portsmouth man edging closer to return to Colchester United action
arts.sum: “But he’s really started to find his rhythm in training this week and it’s been great to see, because he’s a good kid and our heart is with him.” Scully, who is on loan from Championship side Pompey, has experienced an injury-hit season so far, managing only one league start for the U’s in his two loan spells for them to date.

Bradford have lost their last two games and both by the same 1-0 scoreline. Colchester's 3-0 win over Fleetwood last weekend was their fifth successive win in the league, and they are now unbeaten in...
